data.title: ai.chat(message: AIChatMessage, options?: AIChatOptions): Promise<AIChatMessage>
data.concept: Sends a chat message to the AI. Returns a promise that contains the response from the AI. Throws a CasualOSError if an error occurs while sending the message. This function can be useful for creating chat bots, or for using an Artificial Intelligence (AI) to process a message. The first parameter is a AIChatMessage and is the message that should be sent to the AI. The second parameter is optional and is a AIChatOptions and is the options that should be used.

data.title: ai.chat(messages: AIChatMessage[], options?: AIChatOptions): Promise<AIChatMessage>
data.concept: Sends a chat message to the AI. Returns a promise that contains the response from the AI. Throws a CasualOSError if an error occurs while sending the message. This function can be useful for creating chat bots, or for using an Artificial Intelligence (AI) to process a message. The first parameter is a AIChatMessage[]. The second parameter is optional and is a AIChatOptions and is the options that should be used.

data.title: ai.chat(message: string, options?: AIChatOptions): Promise<string>
data.concept: Sends a chat message to the AI. Returns a promise that contains the response from the AI. Throws a CasualOSError if an error occurs while sending the message. This function can be useful for creating chat bots, or for using an Artificial Intelligence (AI) to process a message. The first parameter is a string and is the message that should be sent to the AI. The second parameter is optional and is a AIChatOptions and is the options that should be used.

data.title: ai.generateImage(request: AIGenerateImageOptions, options?: RecordActionOptions): Promise<AIGenerateImageSuccess>
data.concept: Generates an image from the given prompt. Returns a promise that resolves with the Base64 data of the generated image that can be used as the #formAddress of a bot. The first parameter is an AIGenerateImageOptions and is the request object that describes what the image should look like. The second parameter is optional and is a RecordActionOptions and is the options for the request.

data.title: ai.generateImage(prompt: string, negativePrompt?: string, options?: AIGenerateImageOptions & RecordActionOptions): Promise<string>
data.concept: Generates an image from the given prompt. Returns a promise that resolves with the Base64 data of the generated image that can be used as the #formAddress of a bot. The first parameter is a string that describes what the image should look like. The second parameter is optional and is a string that describes what the image should avoid looking like. The third parameter is optional and is a AIGenerateImageOptions & RecordActionsOptions and is the additional options that should be used.

data.title: ai.generateImage(request: AIGenerateImageOptions, options?: RecordActionsOptions): Promise<AIGenerateImageSuccess>
data.concept: Generates an image from the given prompt. Returns a promise that resolves with the Base64 data of the generated image that can be used as the #formAddress of a bot. The first parameter is a AIGenerateImageOptions and is the request object that describes what the image should look like. The second parameter is optional and is a RecordActionsOptions and is the options for the request.

data.title: ai.generateImage(prompt: string, negativePrompt?: string, options?: AIGenerateImageOptions & RecordActionsOptions): Promise<string>
data.concept: Generates an image from the given prompt. Returns a promise that resolves with the Base64 data of the generated image that can be used as the #formAddress of a bot. The first parameter is a string and is the string that describes what the image should look like. The second parameter is a string and is the string that describes what the image should look like. The second parameter is optional and is a string that describes what the image should avoid looking like. The third parameter is optional and is a AIGenerateImageOptions & RecordActionOptions and is the additional options that should be used.

data.title: ai.generateSkybox(request: AIGenerateSkyboxRquest): Promise<AIGenerateSkyboxResult>
data.concept: Generates a skybox image from the given reuqest object. Returns a promise that resolves with an object that contains a URL to the generated image that can be used as the #formAddress of a bot that has #form set to skybox. The first parameter is a AIGenerateSkyboxRequest and is the request object that describes what the skybox should look like.

data.title: ai.generateSkeybox(prompt: string, negativePrompt?: string, options?: AIGenerateSkyboxOptions): Promise<string>
data.concept: Generates a skybox image from the given prompt. Returns a promise that resolves with a URL to the generated image that can be used as the #formAddress of a bot that has #form set to skybox. The first parameter is a string and is the string that describes what the skybox should look like. The second parameter is optional and is a string that describes what the skybox should avoid looking like. The third parameter is optional and is a AIGenerateSkyboxOptions and is the additional options that should be used.

data.title: ai.hume.getAccessToken(recordName?: string): Promise<AIHumeGetAccessTokenResult>
data.concept: Gets an access token for the Hume AI API. Returns a promise that resolves with the access token. The first parameter is optional and is a string and is the name of the record that the access token should be generated for. If omitted, then the user's player studio record will be used.

data.title: ai.sloyd.generateModel(request: AISloydGenerateModelOptions, options: RecordActionsOptions): Promise<AISlydGenerateModelResponse>
data.concept: Generates a new 3D model using sloyd.ai. The first parameter is a AISloydGenerateModelOptions and is the options for the 3D model. The second parameter is a RecordActionsOptions and is the options for the request.

data.title: ai.stream.chat(message: AIChatMessage, options?: AIChatOptions): Promise<AsyncIterable>
data.concept: Sends a chat message to the AI and streams the response back. Returns a promise that resolves with an async iterable that contains the responses from the AI. Throws a CasualOSError if an error occurs while sending the message. This functions can be useful for creating chat bots, or for using an Artificial Intelligence (AI) to process a message. The first parameter is a AIChatMessage and is the message that should be sent to the AI. The second parameter is optional and is a AIChatOptions and is the options and is the options that should be used.

data.title: ai.stream.chat(message: AIChatMessage[], options?: AIChatOptions): Promise<AsyncIterable>
data.concept: Sends a chat message to the AI. Returns a promise that resolves with an async iterable that contians the responses from the AI. Throws a CasualOSError if an error occurs while sending the message. This function can be useful for creating chat bots. or for using an Artificial Intelligence (AI) to process a meessage. The first parameter is a AIChatMessage[]. The second parameter is optional and is a AIChatOptions and is the options that should be used.

data.title: ai.stream.chat(message: string, options?: AIChatOptoins): Promise<AsyncIterable>
data.concept: Sends a chat message to the AI and streams the resposne back. Returns a promise that resolves with an async iterable that contains the responses from the AI. Throws a CasualOSError if an error occurs while sending the message. The first parameter is a string and is the message that should be sent to the AI. The second parameter is optional and is a AIChatOptions and is the options that should be used.
